items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s S3 Sensitive Skin Solvent is specifically designed with sensitive skin in mind, featuring a mild citrus fragrance and medium removal speed.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®’s S3 Sensitive Skin Solvent is specifically designed with sensitive skin in mind, featuring a mild citrus fragrance and medium removal speed. S3’s oil-based formulation ensures that you can trust this solvent to get the job done right without irritating your clients’ skin. Cleanup with S3 is easy – simply rinse with soap and water for great results each time.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: S3 Sensitive Skin Solvent - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedisplayname2: S3 Sensitive Skin Solvent - 4 fl oz, Spray
items.storedescription:
Spray on adhesive area. Breakdown will begin in seconds. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup. Remove residue, shampoo and rinse.

Apply generously on adhesive area for best results.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: S3 Sensitive Skin Solvent - 4 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
